sentences.sContent: The people have grown intolerant in recent weeks of the king's autocratic ways.
sentences.sCn: 最近几周，民众越来越难以忍受国王的专制行径。

remMethod.val: auto(自己) + crat(统治) + ic → 独自统治的 → 独裁的， 专制的

words.tran: 独裁者，专制君主；独断独行的人

trans.tranOther: An autocratic person or organization has complete power and makes decisions without asking anyone else's advice
